title: Forbidden Days
description: Life has been harsh, but after a horrible childhood, Park was finally content. Her beautiful home sat on the edge of the Pacific Ocean in Los Angeles, she had her dream job, and good friends she trusted. Then she's abducted, car-jacked by a stunningly sexy man who she realizes is dangerously crazy...he thinks he's a vampire. Park plays along until she can escape, until she discovers that there are things out there people like her never knew existed. Life changed instantly in one night...vampires do exist and she herself is something more than she ever knew. He'd been alive over three hundred years with few complications, but when Bas went to do a simple compulsion to get a ride on a busy street in L.A. late one night, he found the impossible...a human he couldn't compel. Only, after a taste, he knew...she was something more than human...something different. He had to find out what.This book spawned a bestselling series built in a unique vampire world of strong women, hope, family, and love. Ultimately, the tales lead around the world and to a destiny long ago designed into the universal plan. Take a journey into the spectacular world of the First Blood vampires.
author: C.L. Quinn
